verses.verse: Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

What man <S%H376>soever<s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7819>killeth<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3775>lamb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7819>killeth<s%> it out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%>

And <S%H935>bringeth<s%> it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> unto <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> he hath <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%>

To the <S%H4616>end<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> even that they may <S%H935>bring<s%> them unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2076>offer<s%> them for <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto <S%H8163>devils,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> have gone a <S%H2181>whoring.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> unto them throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Whatsoever <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5927>offereth<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%>

And <S%H935>bringeth<s%> it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> it unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And whatsoever <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H1818>blood;<s%> I will even <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is in the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that maketh an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And whatsoever <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> there be of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6679>hunteth<s%> and <S%H6718>catcheth<s%> any <S%H2416>beast<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> may be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> he shall even pour <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it is the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it is for the <S%H5315>life<s%> thereof: therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of no <S%H3808>manner<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof: <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> that which <S%H5038>died<s%> of itself, or that which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> with beasts, whether it be one of your own <S%H249>country,<s%> or a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> he shall both <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> then shall he be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H3526>wash<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
